name: ZFighter: God of Battle
description:
Warriors from all dimensions, assemble!

Whether a hero or villain, from which dimension, he or she will be gathered into [ZFigher-God of Battle]! Because warriors from all dimensions are about to face a more powerful and terrifying unknown existence! This forces heroes and villains to put down their hatred and join hands to fight against the impending enemy!

[ZFigher-God of Battle] takes the collection and development of warriors, as well as the exploration of the world as the core features, coupled with the classic turn-based system, making different lineups show different power! In addition, multiple players fighting in the same field, gorgeous and exclusive ultimate skills, and powerful combo hit damage bonus will bring you a pleasant gaming experience and refreshing sense of hits!

==Game Features==

[Adventure Starts! Target the Big World]
What will happen when heroes and villains gather together? In order to gain the strength to fight the unknown existence, heroes and villains have to join hands to explore the big world. Challenging plots, biography of each character, more than 100 story stages with different styles are waiting for you to challenge!

[Powerful characters help you overcome difficulties]
You can recruit characters from all dimensions and match them as you wish to form a strong lineup! They will help you get rid of all the difficulties on the way! Each character has an exclusive skill, when it is cast, a full screen gorgeous effect will show up, bringing you great pleasure!

[Brand new and unique development feature]
It adopts brand new development features, all materials can be easily obtained, and upgrade and enhance can be done in one second! Here you can explore occult realms, loot treasures, and collect materials to forge artifacts and gear! Go through the god and demon trial to improve your strength and fight the way to be the best!

[Playing with friends Real social interaction]
In this world where warriors from all dimensions are assembled, you are not fighting alone! The game has many other features (including PVE, PVP, Team Dungeon, Daily Events, Squad Contest), here you can make friends with other like-minded players, compete with each other, or join hands to beat powerful enemies, which will make your gaming progress no longer alone!
